name: Stranded (itch) (NekoPanda98)
description: You (the protagonist) were taking a plane to a foreign city for a vacation when it crashes, landing you stranded on a deserted island. You open your eyes gradually by the gleam of sunshine glaring onto your face, also by the vigorous shaking from yet another survivor. You regain consciousness, sitting up on the sandy beach attempting to regain your composure while aligning your perimeters after being washed ashore. A flashback hits you with the terrors of the plane crash that you faced some moments ago, plunging into the ocean floor. As you resurface on the roaring sea, you cling onto whatever was floating around you as you hold on for dear life. Snapping out of the flashback, the fellow survivor checks for your livelihood. They then help you up on your feet, and bring you towards the group of other survivors; in which they leave you there and search for other potential survivors. And your journey of interactions in the midst of the cold-hard survival and strive to civilization begins there ...
